title: I prefer XL phone. I am waiting for 6XL. During this period, how to use Android 11 Pixel 2 XL safely
content: I am using Pixel 2 XL since it launched. Present Android 11 updates are not possible and afraid the vulnerability due to it. How to continue till the launch of Pixel 6 XL with my Pixel 2 XL phone with Android 11; safely!
